common.drag_hint: Drag tables or views from the left to open here
common.ready_hint: Run a query to see results
common.output_console_connected: [info] Connected to database. Ready for queries.

settingsPage.title: Settings
settingsPage.subtitle: Manage your account settings and preferences

profile.page_desc: Manage your personal information and profile settings

sessions.page_desc: Manage your active sessions and logout from other devices
sessions.dialog_desc: Are you sure you want to logout this device? This action cannot be undone.

password.page_desc: Set a new password. You will be logged out from all devices after the change.
password.email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address
password.old_format: Password must be at least 8 characters and contain both letters and numbers
password.new_format: Password must be at least 8 characters and contain both letters and numbers
password.new_different: New password must be different from current password
password.success_toast: Password reset successfully! You will be logged out from all devices.
password.login_again_toast: Please log in again with your new password
password.hint_length: At least 8 characters, letters and numbers
password.security_notice_desc: After changing your password, you will be automatically logged out from all devices for security reasons. Please log in again with your new password.

settings.reset_confirm: Reset all preferences to their defaults?
settings.result_multi: Open new Result tab for each execution
settings.result_overwrite: Always overwrite the active Result tab
settings.console_new: Open a new console for each table

auth.login_desc: Enter your email and password to access your account
auth.sign_up_desc: Create a new account to get started
auth.password_min_length: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
auth.register_success: Account created successfully! You can now sign in.
auth.login_failed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.

error.not_login: You are not logged in. Please sign in and try again.
error.no_auth: You do not have permission to perform this action.
error.validation: Some fields are invalid. Please check your input and try again.
error.db_connection: Database connection issue. Please try again later.
error.system: Server is busy now. Please try again later.
error.http_400: Request is invalid. Please check your input.
error.http_401: Authentication failed. Please sign in again.
error.http_403: You are not allowed to perform this action.
error.http_500: Server error. Please try again later.
